scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache ../../../config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache ../../../config/mainnet.json src/realm-mapping.template.ts > src/realm-mapping.ts
scripts.prepare:rinkeby: mustache ../../../config/rinkeby.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache ../../../config/rinkeby.json src/realm-mapping.template.ts > src/realm-mapping.ts
scripts.prepare:goerli: mustache ../../../config/goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache ../../../config/goerli.json src/realm-mapping.template.ts > src/realm-mapping.ts
